Package pack.match

Class Tournament

java.lang.Object
pack.match.AbstractTournament
pack.match.Tournament
public class Tournament
extends AbstractTournament
Tournament class. Contains rounds this class is an implementation of the abstract class AbstractTournament

  • Constructor Details

    • Tournament

      public Tournament​(tt_gui theGui, int numberOfPlayers, double prizePot, java.lang.String otherPrize)
      constructor create a tournament for given number of players with given prize pot
      Parameters:
      theGui - tt_gui the instance of the GUI that owns the match report text. For posting the tournament feedback to the gui.
      numberOfPlayers - int - number of real players who want to play in the tournament
      prizePot - double - the prize fund (if there is one)
      otherPrize - string - non-cash prize (if there is one)

    • setNumberOfRounds

      protected int setNumberOfRounds​(int numberOfPlayers)
      work out how many rounds are needed based on the number of players
      Specified by:
      setNumberOfRounds in class AbstractTournament
      Parameters:
      numberOfPlayers - int total number of players in the tournament
      Returns:
      number of rounds int calculated number of rounds needed

    • calcNumberOfByes

      int calcNumberOfByes​(int numberOfPlayers)
      work out how many dummy players are needed to run a tournament
      Specified by:
      calcNumberOfByes in class AbstractTournament
      Parameters:
      numberOfPlayers - int - number of real players
      Returns:
      numByes int - calculated number of dummy players needed

    • runTournament

      void runTournament​(tt_gui theGui, PlayersList thePlayers, PlayersList theMasterList)
      runs a tournament given two lists of players
      Parameters:
      thePlayers - PlayersList - the list of players for the first round
      theMasterList - PlayersList - a copy of thePlayers that will not be overwritten by subsequent rounds
